title: Racism , Hope can clear some one person out of league.
body:
I hope Riot can penalize strong with somebody like this. I tried improving match for win but akali strong when our mid lane feed too much! And I cant make anything more. So I got feed from that time... I hope riot can handle such severe cases better. Bored and dismayed
*links removed*

replies.body: Just sorry about that but my  IELTS was 3. and grammar only 2. :D! Still learning English! :(

You might just want to chat mute and use smart pings
Just at the start of each game say your chat muting then u can get on with it wihout flame or hate :3
but he complaint me first! @@! I never talk too much in game when playing! :(
Your English needs some serious work, should probably improve on it before playing on an English speaking server.
